title: Calories in Starbucks Coconut Milk
meta_description: Discover calories in coconut milk Starbucks per 4 oz serving, including fat, carbs, protein, and nutrition facts for this dairy-free option.
assumptions: Unsweetened coconut milk beverage from Starbucks, per 4 fl oz (118 ml) serving; no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, supplier, and exact formulation. Check Starbucks app or packaging for latest info.

quick_answer.text: A 4 fl oz serving of Starbucks coconut milk contains 45 calories and 4.5 g fat.

label_note: Values align with Nutrition Facts labels for straightforward comparison.

tweaks.label: Sweetened version (add 1 tsp sugar per serving)
Double serving (8 fl oz for a full drink pour)

faqs.q: How many calories in coconut milk Starbucks per serving?
faqs.a: 45 calories in a 4 fl oz serving of Starbucks coconut milk.

faqs.q: Is Starbucks coconut milk low carb?
faqs.a: Yes, only 1 g carbs per 4 fl oz serving, with 0 g sugars.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in Starbucks coconut milk?
faqs.a: 4.5 g total fat, including 4 g saturated fat, per 4 fl oz serving.

faqs.q: Does Starbucks coconut milk have protein?
faqs.a: No protein (0 g) in a 4 fl oz serving; it's a plant-based milk.

faqs.q: How does Starbucks coconut milk compare to dairy milk calories?
faqs.a: Lower at 45 kcal vs. ~60 kcal for 2% dairy milk per 4 fl oz.
